PERSONA.NAME: Egeus
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Father to Hermia, wants Hermia to marry Demetrius

PERSONA.NAME: Philostrate
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Master of the Revels to Theseus

PERSONA.NAME: Quince
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Peter Quince, a carpenter and prologue in the play.

PERSONA.NAME: Bottom
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Nick Bottom, a weaver and Pyramus in the play.

PERSONA.NAME: Flute
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Francis Flute, a bellows-mender and Thisby in the play.

PERSONA.NAME: Snout
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Tom Snout, a tinker and Wall in the play.

PERSONA.NAME: Snug
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A joiner and Lion in the play.

PERSONA.NAME: Starveling
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Robin Starveling, a tailor and Moonshine in the play.

PERSONA.NAME: Hermia
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Daughter to Egeus and in love with Lysander

PERSONA.NAME: Titania
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Queen of the fairies, recently adopts an Indian boy

PERSONA.NAME: Puck
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: As known as Robin Goodfellow or Hobgoblin, he is a trickster and servers Oberon.

PERSONA.NAME: Other Fairies attending their King and Queen
